channel.title: How to?
channel.description: Hey i have server but i need to turn it on that it worked to people. Im runing on hamachi, but i dont understand what to run first that it worked and people can come . Help please.

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:1, topic:417342"][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=519135.msg3774699#msg3774699 date=1318002584]

Most people won’t join a server if they have to use Hamachi.

Portforwarding > Hamachi

I use Hamachi because I don’t host, its only for other testers and such to come and test it out, if I was hosting I would port forward.

Did anybody ask you what you do to test your server? I don’t think so…

Try to portforward your router, you can find helpful tutorials on portforward.com just search for your router model and then look at the guide. If you have a modem, no need for portforwarding.

Sj, I was giving him my example, so he could try and relate to me, and see if he wanted to use that as well.
[/quote]

You weren’t even directing it towards him, unless my eyes are deceiving me, it was directed towards travas.[/quote]
It’s for EVERYONE how about that? Will that work for you?

Read full topic

item.title: How to?

Most people won’t join a server if they have to use Hamachi.

Portforwarding > Hamachi

I use Hamachi because I don’t host, its only for other testers and such to come and test it out, if I was hosting I would port forward.
[/quote]

Did anybody ask you what you do to test your server? I don’t think so…

Try to portforward your router, you can find helpful tutorials on portforward.com just search for your router model and then look at the guide. If you have a modem, no need for portforwarding.[/quote]
Sj, I was giving him my example, so he could try and relate to me, and see if he wanted to use that as well.

Read full topic

item.title: How to?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:5, topic:417201”][quote author=Travas link=topic=519135.msg3773897#msg3773897 date=1317938827]
Most people won’t join a server if they have to use Hamachi.

Portforwarding > Hamachi
[/quote]
I use Hamachi because I don’t host, its only for other testers and such to come and test it out, if I was hosting I would port forward.[/quote]

Try to portforward your router, you can find helpful tutorials on portforward.com just search for your router model and then look at the guide. If you have a modem, no need for portforwarding.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

David321:

Hey i have server but i need to turn it on that it worked to people. Im runing on hamachi, but i dont understand what to run first that it worked and people can come . Help please.

you have to make a group network on your hamachi have people join it and then they have to use your hamachi ip to login
